Tip of the Day
Make sure you equip your items to get their effects, most don't work from inventory alone.

Simple hammer

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Simple hammer
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Tools
Value: 6
Keywords: Smithing hammer
Smithing tool
Search
Keyword: 		Smithing
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Just your standard hammer. Has a steel head and wooden handle. Simple indeed, but better than no hammer at all.

The Simple hammer item is a loot item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

Attribute

+5% Chest finding While doing Smithing.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Simple hammer is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Craft a bronze hammer Needs Basic Workshop service or better. Crafting lvl. 12 1x Simple hammer
2x Bronze bar		 1x Bronze hammer
Craft a tarsilium hammer Needs Basic Workshop service or better. Crafting lvl. 42 1x Simple hammer
2x Tarsilium bar		 1x Tarsilium hammer

Sources

Shop Name Location Region Item Type Stock Price

Recipe Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
